targets.expr:
count by (channel)(wifi_signal_db{
    job="wifi_exporter",
    instance=~"$instance",
    interface=~"$interface",
    frequency_band=~"$frequency_band",
    channel=~"$channel",
})
# 2.4GHz
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "1", "", ""), "frequency_band", "2.4GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "1", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "2", "", ""), "frequency_band", "2.4GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "2", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "3", "", ""), "frequency_band", "2.4GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "3", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "4", "", ""), "frequency_band", "2.4GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "4", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "5", "", ""), "frequency_band", "2.4GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "5", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )

or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "8", "", ""), "frequency_band", "2.4GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "8", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "9", "", ""), "frequency_band", "2.4GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "9", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "10", "", ""), "frequency_band", "2.4GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "10", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "11", "", ""), "frequency_band", "2.4GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "11", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "12", "", ""), "frequency_band", "2.4GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "12", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "13", "", ""), "frequency_band", "2.4GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "13", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
# 5GHz
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "36", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "36", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "40", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "40", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "44", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "44", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "48", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "48", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "52", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "52", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "56", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "56", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "60", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "60", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "64", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "64", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )

or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "108", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "108", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "112", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "112", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "116", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "116", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "120", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "120", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "124", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "124", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )
or (label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "128", "", ""), "frequency_band", "5GHz", "", "") and label_replace(label_replace(vector(0), "channel", "128", "", ""), "frequency_band", "$frequency_band", "", "") )

sum by (BSSID,SSID)(wifi_signal_db{
    job="wifi_exporter",
    instance=~"$instance",
    interface=~"$interface",
    frequency_band=~"$frequency_band",
    channel=~"$channel",
})

sum by (BSSID,SSID)(wifi_signal_db{
    job="wifi_exporter",
    instance=~"$instance",
    interface=~"$interface",
    frequency_band=~"$frequency_band",
